page.title: 03WINFORD HOSPITAL CONT.
page.content: {WINFORD HOSPITAL SCHOOL This was recognized by the{Board of {Education}in 1928. School classes are held daily and a wide range of subjects is covered. Winford is also the administrative base for the{ {Bristol Children's Hospital, {Bristol Royal Infirmary, Bristol {Eye Hospital, Southmead and {Weston Hospitals. {NURSE TRAINING General student training is given at Winford. Students also do the first part of their{State Registered Nurse course at Winford. {RELATIVES' BUNGALOW This was built in 1975 from voluntary funds and is situated next to the Children's Ward. {ORTHOPAEDIC SURGERY 2500 patients are admitted every year. The waiting list is increasing.
